attributes.action: Building Regulations to avoid overheating in glass buildings
attributes.additional_details:
We, the residents at High Point Village, are suffering from overheating; some flats are 35 degrees centigrade in summer; the top floor corridor in one building over 40 degrees. This is a serious health hazard as very hot summers are predicted due to global warming.

Regulations need to be put in place for builders of glass buildings to provide a solution to reduce temperatures and adhere to the guidelines on overheating.
